name: Media Consumption Log
description: In the Media Consumption Log Brightspace Data Set, each row represents one session where a user interacted with a media object, beginning when the user starts playback and ending when the user stops engaging with the media object. The data set captures events from November 2023 onwards.

columns.name: LogId
columns.description: Unique identifier for this consumption session.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user who consumed the content.

columns.name: ContentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the content that was consumed.

columns.name: RevisionId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the revision of the content that was consumed.

columns.name: ContentType
columns.description: Type of content for this revision: Audio or Video.

columns.name: ClientApp
columns.description: Location in Brightspace from which the content was added. Field can be null.

columns.name: DateConsumed
columns.description: Date and time when the user started this consumption session (UTC).

columns.name: DurationPercentageWatched
columns.description: Percentage (from 0 to 100) of the content's duration that the user consumed in this session.
